description: Forest Department - Order to declare that the Kodigahakanda Forest in Ihala Athuraliya, Athuraliya D/S Division, Matara District and the Boralugoda Forest in Boralugoda, the Patrakanda alias Relagala Forest in Hedigalla, both of Palinda uwara D/S Division and the Kumarakanda Forest in Lihiniyawa, Walallawita D/S Division all of Kalutara District and the Medapihilla Forest in Medapihilla and Talagoda, Naula D/S Division, Matale District as Reserved Forests
